title: 12/06/21 DPS Hour 2 Marcus Freeman
itunes:title: 12/06/21 DPS Hour 2 Marcus Freeman
description:
Marcus Freeman talks to Dan about how he got the Notre Dame head coaching job. Marcus says he was offered a job with Brian Kelly at LSU.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
